files.patch:
@@ -163,2 +163,2 @@
-     * of {@code InputStream}, this method does not return zero if the end of
-     * the stream has been reached and {@code len == 0}.
+     * of {@code InputStream}, this method returns {@code -1} instead of zero
+     * if the end of the stream has been reached and {@code len == 0}.
